column11: Negates enemy's effective bonus towards flying units.
Increases sight in Fog of War by 4 squares. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.
Stops movement and does 10 damage to anyone who crosses it.
Temporarily makes an adjacent square on the map unable to be traversed.
Raises Resistance by 7. Effect decreases by 1 each turn..
User buy items in shops for half price.
Targets Resistance. Inflicts light magic damage at ranged.
Strong vs. Lances. Weak vs. Axes.
Allows user to strike twice in one attack.
Targets Resistance. Inflicts Wind magic damage. Effective vs. flying units.
Targets Resistance. Inflicts Dark magic damage. Restores HP to user equal to damage dealt.
Strong vs. Axes. Weak vs. Swords.
Allows user to strike twice in one attack.
May inflict damage to the user instead when attacking.
Strong vs. Swords. Weak vs. Lances.
Strong vs. Swords. Weak vs Lances.
Allows user to strike twice in one attack.
Allows user to strike twice in one attack.
Restores HP equal to damage dealt.
Cannot be countered. Halves enemy's current HP.
Restores HP to an adjacent ally equal to (Magic +10).
Restores HP to an adjacent ally equal to (Magic +20).
Lights up an area in Fog of War. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.
Restores all HP to an adjacent ally.
Restores all conditions to an adjacent ally.
Fully repairs an adjacent ally's weapon to full durability.
Increases an adjacent ally's Resistance by 7. Bonus decreases by 1 each turn. Provides 17 EXP to the user.
Restores HP to an ally equal to (Magic +10).
Inflicts Berserk to one enemy. Provides 40 EXP to the user.
Teleports one ally to an adjacent space to user.
Restores HP to all allies in range equal to (Magic +10).
Teleports an adjacent ally to any traversable space on the map.
